subject: Basketball
College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Adrian Hill scored 18 points and sparked a late run as host Rutgers rallied for a victory against Cincinnati on Saturday. Jaron Griffin added 14 points for the Scarlet Knights.
snippet: Adrian Hill scored 18 points and sparked a late run as host Rutgers rallied for a victory against Cincinnati on Saturday. Jaron Griffin added 14 points for the Scarlet Knights.
